description:
Using his entertainment Duel, Yuushou has pushed Yuuri into a corner. Yuuya struggles desperately to keep from being swallowed by Z-ARC. He sees his father fighting and the pride he feels helps him begin to come back to himself! But the more cornered he is, the more Yuuri smiles...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 輝かしきエンタメショー
